remarks: Axiom of infinity in a constructive setting.  This asserts the existence of the special set we want (the set of natural numbers), instead of the existence of a set with some properties ( ~ ax-iinf ) from which one then proves ( ~ omex ) using full separation that the wanted set exists.  "vn" is for "Von Neumann".  (Contributed by BJ, 14-Nov-2019.)
statement:
ax-infvn $p |- E. x ( Ind x /\ A. y ( Ind y -> x C_ y ) ) $.
$d x y $.
